name: Deck Casters
description: Experience an entirely new kind of strategic gameplay that fuses together deck-building, RTS and MOBA in one epic experience. Wield the 5 elements, build your deck and unleash powerful spells and creatures to crush your opponent.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-Bit) Processor: Intel i5 4th-Generation 2.7 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
